name: Hive In Space
description:
Playtime: 30 to 60 minutes

Gameplay: You will experience various anomalies such as hallucinations and auditory illusions in outer space.
Utilize your auditory and visual senses to overcome these anomalies and successfully migrate to new planets.
If you experience any hallucinations or abnormal conditions, proceed through the ‘West’ door. If you don’t, proceed to the ‘North’ door.

Story: Fifteen years from now, as a black hole threatens to engulf the solar system, humanity has decided to migrate to the planet Trappist-1e. I was appointed as the chief engineer aboard the Hive spacecraft. However, during the astronaut test, I experienced severe anomalies such as hallucinations and auditory illusions after entering cryosleep. Yet, since these phenomena were unique to me, I pretended everything was normal and passed the test. As long as the antimatter engine remains stable until our arrival at Trappist. there should be no issues.

Developer’s Note: Hive In Space began with the goal of “developing a game alone within 30 days.” As a non-specialist, I self-taught Unreal Engine. Consequently, there may be gameplay limitations, but I appreciate your understanding as you play.

Distribution: If you could include the game’s title or a link to its Steam page in your livestream title or video description, it would greatly support a solo developer. We do not assume responsibility for any damages resulting from the distribution of videos related to this game.
